channel.title: Microplatform on Foundries.io
channel.description: Recent content in Microplatform on Foundries.io

item.title: microPlatform update 35
item.description:
Summary

Zephyr microPlatform changes for 35

A very active snapshot from Zephyr as part of the v1.14 development cycle. Tree-wide refactoring for DTS, board.h include removal and more logging changes. MCUboot and sample applications updated as a result.

Linux microPlatform changes for 35

Core layer updates based on the latest OE/Yocto master changes.

item.title: microPlatform update 34
item.description:
Summary

Zephyr microPlatform changes for 34

A somewhat smaller update of Zephyr as part of the v1.14 development cycle – no changes to MCUboot or the sample applications.

Linux microPlatform changes for 34

LMP Unified Linux Kernel updated to the 4.18.18 stable release. Core layer updates based on the latest OE/Yocto master/thud changes.

item.title: microPlatform update 33
item.description:
Summary

Zephyr microPlatform changes for 33

The push towards v1.14 continues; MCUboot supports nRF52840 Dongle.

Linux microPlatform changes for 33

LMP Unified Linux Kernel updated to the 4.18.16 stable release. Core layer updates based on the latest OE/Yocto master/thud changes. Initial support for the 96Boards HiKey960 board.

item.title: microPlatform update 0.32
item.description:
Summary

Zephyr microPlatform changes for 0.32

The push towards v1.14 continues; MCUboot supports encrypted images.

Linux microPlatform changes for 0.32

LMP Unified Linux Kernel updated to the 4.18.16 stable release. Core layer updates based on the latest OE/Yocto master/thud changes. Initial support for the 96Boards HiKey960 board.
